resources.string:
This Android App utilizes date facts from the NumbersApi.com website, allowing the user three fun options for receiving random facts about a particular date from the year 1 A.D., to the current year:

 ● In The Year: will pull a random fact about a day from the year entered

 ● On Your Birthday: will pull a random fact about a day from the month and date entered - try with your own Birth Date!

 ● Surprise Me!: will pull a random fact about a random day from a random year!

 Tech Stack:

 ● written in Java (with native Android Code)

 ● connects to JSON endpoints with Retrofit2 Library

 ● built with CardViews and ConstraintLayout

 ● tested with JUnit4 unit tests
